publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-531 Brian Adam: Evening Express Aberdeen Champions Awards-That the Parliament congratulates the winners of the Evening Express Aberdeen Champions awards, which recognise their immense contributions to North East Scotland society and commends the newspaper for running these awards.

S2M-531 Brian Adam: Evening Express Aberdeen Champions Awards-That the Parliament congratulates the winners of the Evening Express Aberdeen Champions awards, which recognise their immense contributions to North East Scotland society and commends the newspaper for running these awards.

S2M-531 Evening Express Aberdeen Champions Awards (lodged on 29 October 2003) Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Jamie Stone*, John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Mike Rumbles*, Mr Richard Baker*
S2M-531 Evening Express Aberdeen Champions Awards (lodged on 29 October 2003) Stewart Stevenson*, Robin Harper*, Rosie Kane*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
